zh.title: 国际度量衡大会重新定义“米”
美国宣布退出联合国教科文组织
莫桑比克总统萨莫拉飞机失事身亡
朝鲜半岛核问题框架协议签署
“卡特里娜”飓风造成严重破坏
利比亚前领导人卡扎菲身亡
美国宣布退出《中导条约》

en.title: Karen Silkwood case documents mysteriously disappeared.
The meter was redefined based on the speed of light.
President Reagan vetoed the Comprehensive Anti-Apartheid Act.
North Korea and the United States signed an Agreed Framework.
The Ladbroke Grove rail crash occurred in London, killing 31.
The Spirit rover was launched towards Mars.
Hurricane Wilma became the most intense Atlantic hurricane on record.
Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi was killed in Sirte.
Back to the Future Day was celebrated, referencing the film.
The World Health Organization approved the malaria vaccine.
